info.name: Yahoo! Dark Night
info.description:
Dark / night mode for all Yahoo webpages except mail.

If you would like to donate, please click the button below.
info.additionalInfo:
GitHub Page: https://github.com/ranjotsingh/Yahoo-Dark-Night-Theme

data.title: just what i was looking for
